title: What are some examples of primitive weapons? How were they used? - Quora

response.answer_text: Handmade knives , spears, bows and arrows. But my favorite is the atl atl or spear thrower. Spear-thrower - Wikipedia You make sort of a cradle for the spear and it gives you an amazing amount of leverage. In fact the first time I tried this was out side on the San Diego campus. I nearly hit some one who was walking on the other side of the quad. (woops!)
